alert.note: Alert for South and East Jackson, Larimer, North and Northeast Grand, Northwest Boulder Counties Above 9000 Feet; South and Southeast Grand, West Central and Southwest Boulder, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Summit, North and West Park Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 02 at 8:04PM MST until December 03 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST SUNDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Heavy snow, along with blowing snow. Total snow accumulations between 9 and 18 inches. Winds gusts as high as 75 mph. * WHERE...Rocky Mountain National Park and the Medicine Bow Range, and The Mountains of Summit County, the Mosquito Range, and the Indian Peaks. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Visibility will be near zero at times resulting in white out conditions. Travel will be treacherous and potentially life-threatening. Snow covered roads will make travel hazardous. Travel may become very difficult to impossible due to heavy snowfall on roadways.
info.instruction: Roads will be slick and snowpacked resulting in slow and hazardous travel. Allow extra time to reach your destination. Consider altering your travel plans. Heavy snowfall is expected to make travel very difficult to impossible.

area.areaDesc: South and East Jackson, Larimer, North and Northeast Grand, Northwest Boulder Counties Above 9000 Feet; South and Southeast Grand, West Central and Southwest Boulder, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Summit, North and West Park Counties Above 9000 Feet
